TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataRecord

summary.span: 为 提供对每行中的列值的访问权限，并由访问关系数据库的.NET Framework 数据提供程序实现。

span.span: Provides access to the column values within each row for a , and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 接口允许继承类实现 `DataReader` 类。The and interfaces enable an inheriting class to implement a `DataReader` class. 这提供了一种方法来读取一个或多个结果集的只进流。This provides a way of reading one or more forward-only streams of result sets. 有关 `DataReader` 类的详细信息，请参阅[使用 DataReader 检索数据](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader)。For more information about `DataReader` classes, see [Retrieving Data Using a DataReader](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-data-using-a-datareader). 应用程序不会直接创建 接口的实例，而是创建继承 的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 通常，可通过 `Command` 对象的 `ExecuteReader` 方法获取 `DataReader` 来执行此操作。Typically, you do this by obtaining a `DataReader` through the `ExecuteReader` method of the `Command` object. 继承 的类必须实现所有继承成员，并且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 实现 `DataReader` 的提供程序需要公开公共语言运行时（CLR）类型中的数据。Providers implementing a `DataReader` are required to expose data in common language runtime (CLR) types. 为不包含在 CLR 中的某些类型定义类型强制。Type coercion is defined for some types not included in the CLR. 这些值可以作为符合 CLR 类型的备用类型进行访问。These values may be accessed as alternative types that comply with CLR types. 作为示例，下表列出了建议从 OLE DB 数据类型映射到 CLR 类型的映射，并将替代类型括在括号中。As an example, the following table lists suggested mappings from OLE DB data types to CLR types, with alternative types in parentheses. |OLE DB 类型OLE DB type|CLR 类型CLR type| |-----------------|--------------| |DBTYPE_BOOLDBTYPE_BOOL|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_BSTRDBTYPE_BSTR|stringstring| |DBTYPE_BYTESDBTYPE_BYTES|byte[]byte[]| |DBTYPE_CYDBTYPE_CY|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_DATEDBTYPE_DATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBDATEDBTYPE_DBDATE|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMEDBTYPE_DBTIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMPDBTYPE_DBTIMESTAMP|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_DECIMALDBTYPE_DECIMAL|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_EMPTYDBTYPE_EMPTY|Nullnull| |DBTYPE_ERRORDBTYPE_ERROR|ExternalExceptionExternalException| |DBTYPE_FILETIMEDBTYPE_FILETIME|DateTimeDateTime| |DBTYPE_GUIDDBTYPE_GUID|GuidGuid| |DBTYPE_HCHAPTERDBTYPE_HCHAPTER|不支持not supported| |DBTYPE_I1DBTYPE_I1|SByteSByte| |DBTYPE_I2DBTYPE_I2|Int16Int16| |DBTYPE_I4DBTYPE_I4|Int32Int32| |DBTYPE_I8DBTYPE_I8|Int64Int64| |DBTYPE_IDISPATCHDBTYPE_IDISPATCH|对象object| |DBTYPE_IUNKNOWNDBTYPE_IUNKNOWN|对象object| |DBTYPE_NULLDBTYPE_NULL|DBNull.ValueDBNull.Value| |DBTYPE_NUMERICDBTYPE_NUMERIC|DecimalDecimal| |DBTYPE_PROPVARIANTDBTYPE_PROPVARIANT|对象object| |DBTYPE_R4DBTYPE_R4|SingleSingle| |DBTYPE_R8DBTYPE_R8|DoubleDouble| |DBTYPE_STRDBTYPE_STR|stringstring| |DBTYPE_UDTDBTYPE_UDT|不支持not supported| |DBTYPE_UI1DBTYPE_UI1|byte （Int16）byte (Int16)| |DBTYPE_UI2DBTYPE_UI2|UInt16 （Int32）UInt16 (Int32)| |DBTYPE_UI4DBTYPE_UI4|UInt32 （Int64）UInt32 (Int64)| |DBTYPE_UI8DBTYPE_UI8|UInt64 （十进制）UInt64 (Decimal)| |DBTYPE_VARIANTDBTYPE_VARIANT|对象object| |DBTYPE_VARNUMERICDBTYPE_VARNUMERIC|不支持not supported| |DBTYPE_WSTRDBTYPE_WSTR|stringstring| ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，、和 。The following example creates instances of the derived classes, , , and . 该示例将读取数据，并将其写出到控制台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最后，该示例关闭 ，然后 。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果未位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录中的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid recordset, 0; otherwise, the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行不返回行的查询（例如，使用 方法）后， 返回-1。After executing a query that does not return rows (for example, using the method), returns -1.

summary.span: 作为布尔值获取指定列的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified column as a Boolean.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不执行任何转换。No conversions are performed. 因此，检索的数据必须已是布尔值;否则，将生成异常。Therefore, the data retrieved must already be a Boolean; otherwise an exception is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public long GetBytes (int i, long fieldOffset, byte[] buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetBytes(int32 i, int64 fieldOffset, unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 bufferoffset, int32 length) cil managed
Public Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer, int bufferoffset, int length);
abstract member GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 字段中作为读取操作起始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field from which to start the read operation.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要将字节流读入的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: 开始读取操作的 的索引。

span.span: The index for to start the read operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 将字节流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 通常，这是字段的准确长度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 但是，如果已使用 `GetBytes` 从字段获取字节，则返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 如果传递 `null`的缓冲区，则 返回行的长度（以字节为单位）。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the row in bytes. 不执行任何转换;因此，检索的数据必须已经是字节数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

exception.span: 传递的索引位于 0 至 的范围之外。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 通常，这是字段的准确长度。Frequently this is the exact length of the field. 但是，如果已使用 `GetChars` 获取字段中的字符，则返回的数字可能小于字段的准确长度。However, the number returned may be less than the exact length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 如果传递的是 `null`的缓冲区，则 `GetChars` 返回字段的长度（以字符为限）。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, `GetChars` returns the length of the field in characters. 不执行任何转换，因此检索的数据必须已经是字符数组。No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据类型信息可不同于 `GetFieldType` 返回的类型信息，特别是在基础数据类型没有一对一映射到语言支持的运行时类型时。The data type information can differ from the type information returned by `GetFieldType`, especially where the underlying data types do not map one for one to the runtime types supported by the language. （例如，`DataTypeName` 可以是 "integer"，而 `Type.Name` 可以是 "Int32"。）(for example, `DataTypeName` may be "integer", while `Type.Name` may be "Int32".)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetOrdinal(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetOrdinal (name As String) As Integer

span.span: The name of the field to find.

summary.span: 返回命名字段的索引。

span.span: Return the index of the named field.

returns.span: 命名字段的索引。

span.span: The index of the named field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetOrdinal` 首先执行区分大小写的查找。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失败，将进行第二个不区分大小写的搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. `GetOrdinal` 不区分假名宽度。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 如果找不到命名字段的索引，则会引发 `IndexOutOfRangeException`。If the index of the named field is not found, an `IndexOutOfRangeException` is thrown. 因为基于序号的查找比命名查找更高效，因此在循环内调用 `GetOrdinal` 效率低下。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 通过调用 `GetOrdinal` 一次，并将结果分配给整数变量以便在循环中使用，从而节省时间。Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` one time and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用继承的 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the inherited method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetValues(object[] values) cil managed
Public Function GetValues (values As Object()) As Integer

param.name: values
param.span: 要将属性字段复制到其中的 数组。

span.span: An array of to copy the attribute fields into.

summary.span: 使用当前记录的列值填充对象的数组。

span.span: Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.

returns.span: 数组中 的实例的数目。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序， 方法提供了一种有效的方法来检索所有列，而不是单独检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 可以传递一个 数组，该数组包含的列数少于所产生行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 仅将 数组保存的数据量复制到数组中。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 还可以传递 数组，其长度大于结果行中包含的列数。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可在调用类型化 get 方法之前（例如 、等）查看是否存在 null 列值，以避免引发错误。Call this method to see if there are null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, , , and so on) to avoid raising an error.

public: property System::Object ^ default[int] { System::Object ^ get(int i); };

param.name: i
param.span: 要获取的列的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the column to get.

summary.span: 获取位于指定索引处的列。

span.span: Gets the column located at the specified index.

value.span: 位于作为 指定索引处的列。

span.span: The column located at the specified index as an .

exception.span: 传递的索引位于 0 至 的范围之外。

span.span: The index passed was outside the range of 0 through .

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(name As String) As Object
public: property System::Object ^ default[System::String ^] { System::Object ^ get(System::String ^ name); };

span.span: The name of the column to find.

summary.span: 获取具有指定名称的列。

span.span: Gets the column with the specified name.

value.span: 具有指定名称、作为 的列。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先执行区分大小写的查找。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失败，将进行第二个不区分大小写的搜索。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 此方法不区分假名宽度。This method is kana-width insensitive.

exception.span: 未找到具有指定名称的列。

span.span: No column with the specified name was found.
